Looking for additional event services? We will provide a doorman, coat-check, and help organize extra entertainment like a dj and photo booth.

title: Prime Prinsengracht Corner Location opposite Anne Frank House
description:
This prime corner location opposite the Anne Frank House has a dual east-west aspect providing ample natural light.  The space has a versatile configuration with a small kitchen and restroom, basement storage and a large retail counter. 


At the ground level of an ultra-high visibility Rijksmonument, the store has double doors opening onto the Prinsengracht offering high volumes of pedestrian traffic. Large windows look out onto both the Prinsengracht and the Bloemgracht. 


With high ceilings, exposed 17th-century beams and original marble flooring, this is a unique space in central Amsterdam at the junction of the Jordaan and the Canal Ring.


Please note that this property has a number of restrictions due to being zoned  “Gemengd - 1”. Specifically no bars, cafés or restaurants ("Horeca") are permitted.  And since the retail space is below a residential apartment, there are noise and hour restrictions. So only between 09:00 hrs and 19:00 hrs unless by pricier agreement. 

Furthermore, the building is a Rijksmonument located within the UNESCO Canal Ring. So there are restrictions on the use of external signage and decorations, even temporarily.


The space can be rented for a minimum period of 4 days to 30 days. Longer periods are possible on request. 

The four day weekend rental period runs from Friday (+/- 0830h) to Monday (+/- 18h)
The basic price is € 300 per day (minimum 4 days weekend days € 350), € 1,400 (plus btw) per week and € 2,500 (plus btw) per 2 consecutive weeks. A surcharge of 30% applies from September to December.
